channel.title: Making NPCs Aggressive?
channel.description: I was wondering how to make NPCs aggressive... I've tried NPCHandler.java, that didn't work. (Although I did make all the dragons breathe fire. Lol.) I couldn't find how to do this. The only thing I found was in the NPCHandler.java, but like I said above, it didn't work. If you know how could you explain, or possibly give me a link to the thread... Thanks.

item.title: Making NPCs Aggressive?
item.dc:creator: @Piled_by_Noobs Piled by Noobs
item.description:
@Piled_by_Noobs wrote:

I was wondering how to make NPCs aggressive… I’ve tried NPCHandler.java, that didn’t work. (Although I did make all the dragons breathe fire. Lol.)
I couldn’t find how to do this. The only thing I found was in the NPCHandler.java, but like I said above, it didn’t work.
If you know how could you explain, or possibly give me a link to the thread…
Thanks.

Read full topic
